case.title: Delightfully deviant mature lady/housekeeper - 45 (Cambs 100miles)
case.text:
Delightful mature lady (45), seeks gentleman to care for. Would suit someone looking for more personal attention. I am willing to live in, accompany you to events, travel etc
I am seeking an arrangement.
You should be a non smoker, affluent, alpha male, single.and most importantly over 45..... thank you for looking.
